title: European Union to reveal ratings for candidate countries – Europe live
summary: Kaja Kallas is set to provide an update this afternoon on the advancements made by countries in their pursuit of joining the European Union. The report will likely outline the current status of their membership applications. This announcement comes as part of ongoing efforts to assess and support potential EU candidates.

title: Concerns raised over planned second removal of Iranian who returned to UK on small boat
summary: Lawyers have informed the Home Office about a man's health concerns, arguing that returning to France would pose significant dangers due to smuggling gangs. The man is seeking refuge, citing his safety and well-being as paramount. The situation highlights the complexities surrounding asylum and immigration issues.

title: Elon Musk’s $1tn Tesla pay deal to be rejected by huge Norway wealth fund
summary: A major investor, the seventh largest stakeholder in the carmaker, has announced plans to vote against a proposed package during the upcoming annual shareholder meeting. This decision reflects concerns over the company's strategic direction or governance issues. The investor's opposition may influence the outcome of the vote and the company's future decisions.

title: US elections 2025 live: Americans go to the polls, with elections in New York City, New Jersey, Virginia and California
summary: The upcoming New York mayoral race is drawing significant attention both in the U.S. and internationally. Democratic candidate Zohran Mamdani will compete against former Governor Andrew Cuomo and Republican Curtis Sliwa. The election is poised to be a notable contest as candidates vie for the mayoralty.

title: Applying for benefits is anxiety-inducing - and the weird language makes it much worse  | Zoe Williams
summary: Zoe Williams highlights that while the staff are supportive, the application forms contain alarming language, unnecessary cliffhangers, and stark warnings that create added stress for applicants. She emphasizes the need for a more compassionate approach. Overall, the communication can be overwhelming and counterproductive.
